item.title: Dībāchah-i dīvānʹsarā sar ʻunvān dar z̲ikr-i shammah-ʼi az aḥvāl-i sarʹdaftar-i ahl-i zabān sukhanʹfahm nuktahʹdān Jināb-i Ṭarzī Ṣāḥib-i Afghān ṭūl ʻumruh
notes: Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress Web site.
With: Qaṣāʼid-i fuyūz̤-i ʻavāʼid / maʻa tārīkhāt-i jināb-i Sardār Ghulām Muḥammad Khān. Karāchī : Dar Maṭbaʻ-i Fayz̤ Muḥammadī, 1309 [1892].

Inscription on title page: "Az māl-i khāliṣ-i [=khāṣṣ-i] Asmā Rasmīyah Khānum zawjah-ʼi Maḥmūd Ṭarzī mībāshad kih bi-qīmat-i 9 rūpīyah-i Kābulī īn ganj-i bīʹbahā rā mālikah gardīdah ast fī 11 Shaʻbān-i muʻaẓẓam sanah-i 1336 fī ʻaynīyah-ʼi Kābul."
other_title: ديباچه ديوانسرا سر عنوان در ذکر شمۀ از احوال سردفتر اهل زبان سخنفهم نکتهدان جناب طرزى صاحب افغان طول عمره /

subject: india
title: Dībāchah-i dīvānʹsarā sar ʻunvān dar z̲ikr-i shammah-ʼi az aḥvāl-i sarʹdaftar-i ahl-i zabān sukhanʹfahm nuktahʹdān Jināb-i Ṭarzī Ṣāḥib-i Afghān ṭūl ʻumruh
description: Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress Web site. With: Qaṣāʼid-i fuyūz̤-i ʻavāʼid / maʻa tārīkhāt-i jināb-i Sardār Ghulām Muḥammad Khān. Karāchī : Dar Maṭbaʻ-i Fayz̤ Muḥammadī, 1309 [1892]. Lithograph. Inscription on title page: "Az māl-i khāliṣ-i [=khāṣṣ-i] Asmā Rasmīyah Khānum zawjah-ʼi Maḥmūd Ṭarzī mībāshad kih bi-qīmat-i 9 rūpīyah-i Kābulī īn ganj-i bīʹbahā rā mālikah gardīdah ast fī 11 Shaʻbān-i muʻaẓẓam sanah-i 1336 fī ʻaynīyah-ʼi Kābul." In Persian.
other_title: ديباچه ديوانسرا سر عنوان در ذکر شمۀ از احوال سردفتر اهل زبان سخنفهم نکتهدان جناب طرزى صاحب افغان طول عمره /
